attributes.action: Stop invocation of Article 50, 2009 Lisbon Treaty which commences EU withdrawal
attributes.additional_details:
FOR ALL THOSE WHO BELIEVE THE REFERENDUM DECISION WAS WRONG.
LETS LOBBY PARLIAMENT TO STOP THIS MADNESS.  
THE REFERENDUM WAS ADVISORY. 
IT MAY BE POLITICAL SUICIDE NOT TO FOLLOW IT - BUT WHO CARES ABOUT THE POLITICIANS?  
WE DONT HAVE TO LEAVE THE EU - ITS STILL A DECISION MADE BY OUR POLITICIANS
attributes.background:
FOR ALL THOSE WHO BELIEVE THE REFERENDUM DECISION WAS WRONG
